name: BreedSpace (SAE Amsterdam)
description:
BreedSpace 

2.5D Platformer 

You know how humans treat chickens, so this was to be expected. Alien chickens have abducted all human chicken farmers from earth in order to rescue the chickens from earth. But little do they know about the humans, and one, Bubba, a redneck chicken farmer breaks out of his cryopod prison and starts to wreck havoc in the alien chicken spaceship. 

Winner of the SAE Alumni Awards 2012 

https://alumni.sae.edu/sae-alumni-awards-winners-2012/

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2012

  •  3 months time 
  • 11 game students
  • 1 audio students 
  • 1 programmer
